title: No Bake Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
instructions: Line baking sheet with wax paper. Combine sugar, milk, butter, and cocoa in saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Boil for 1 minute. Remove from heat. Stir in oats, peanut butter, and vanilla. Drop by spoonfuls onto prepared baking sheet. Let cool until set.
